notes:
STRASS DESMOND



ATTN; MR. MISTA TEE FOO,

I AM NOT USE TO RECEIVING THIS TYPE OF MAILS,AS REGARD QUESTION AS TO WHAT TYPE OF LAWYERUSES YAHOO EMAIL ACCOUNT.PLEASE WE SHOULD BE POLITE IN OUR DEALING.

WELL MR DAVID AKAMBA HAS TOLD ME ABOUT YOU,AND THAT HE WANTS YOU TO ASSIST HIMTO MOVE HIS FAMILY VALUABLES TO YOUR COUNTRY,BUT HE WANTS ME TO DRAW UP AN AGREEMENTFOR THE TRANSACTION SO THATHE WILL BE REST ASSURED THAT THERE WOULD BE A MUTUAL TRUST.

SINCE I HAVEHEARD FROM YOU,I HAVE TO DRAW UP AN AGREEMENT FOR BOTH OF YOU. SO PLEASE IWANT TO KNOW IF I SHOULD PROCEED WITH THEDRAFTING OF THE AGREEMENT.

REGARDS,

DESMOND.

STRASS DESMOND




ATTN; MR. T,

WE ARE NOT USE TO THIS TYPE OF UNGUIDED MAILS.AND FROM YOUR WRITE UP ,IT SHOWS WHO YOU ARE,I CAN NOW UNDERSTAND WHY MR .DAVID AKAMBA WANTED ME TO DRAFT AN AGREEMENT BETWEEN BOTH OF YOU BEFORE HE CAN PROCEED WITH YOU.I DONT HAVE TIME TO DEAL WITH PEOPLE WITHSUCH CHARACTERS,I REGRET TO TELL YOU THATI WILL QUITE HAVING ANYTHING TO DO WITH YOU.

I WILL INFORM MR. DAVID AKAMBA ABOUT THIS.

BYE.
DESMOND.

messages.body:
akamba@zwallet.com

good day,


compliment of the season to you and your entire family, and hope life with you is well and business condition is okay,if so thanks be to God almight. please i am very sorry for sending this email to you dont mind we dont know each other before , this pro

posal i think your trust worthy will see this transaction true.

I need your help,I am DAVID AKAMBA the son of the late chief RICHAARD AKAMBA of a village near monrovia Liberia he is a diamond and gold dealer and top flight politician in Liberia.

I came to know you in the course of my search for foriegn investors`who can assist my family to invest the fund outside africa, our late father chief AKAMBA who was serious gold and diamond dealer and the top flight politician,to the current


government, who was killed by president charles Taylor in the year 2002, we later find out that our father during his gold and diamond business time he has deposited two metal boxes containing money and 35million usd cash with a security company in Accra

ghana.

In recovering that, we fine out that he stated in the agreement with the security company that with out a foriegn partner, the money should not be released to the next of kin,because he intended to invest the money outside africa for onward investment.




The money kept in the trunk boxes was registered as family treasure, the content is not known to the security.
in your assistance of presenting you to the security company as a foriegn partner we are willing to give you 15% of the total content of the boxes, and also 5% for expenses you may incure during this transction.

All necesary document regarding the deposit are with me as the next of kin,and my late fathers attorney out the time of deposit will assist us legally by proving you as the foriegn partner, in your reply include your phone and fax numbers for further dis
cussion.

note that this transaction is 100% risk free and legal by ghana judiciary,

pls if inrested ? pls reply or call me through my email or call me
email-david_akamba@yahoo.com
mobile-00233-24-863991


Best Regards,
DAVID AKAMBA


N B , I AM ADDRESSING THIS EMAIL TO MYSELF FOR THE SAFETY OF THIS TRANSACTION
PLS. AND I WANT IT TO BE CONFIDENTIAL BETWEEN ME AND YOU.

messages.body: What do I have to do?

MR T

From: Mr T!
To: David Akamba (akamba@zwallet.com)

What do I have to do?

messages.body:
good day ,

thanks for your reply ,

what you have to do is that ,

you will act as our foriegn partner , we only need our family lawyer to raise a power attorney that will authorize you as the foriegn partner the fund in the trunk box will be delivered to you on our behalf . .and also help us invest the funds in business that will attract more income in your country ,and we will give you 15% of the total fund and addition 5% for expenses you may incure during this transaction .

pls do send me this information about your self for us to be sure that we are in safe hands , and our money we be safe in your hands before our arrival to your country to join you there.

your complete address of where you stay and come from ,
business experaince and age ,mobile phone number and fax number for further details , and scan the first two pages of your international passport ,

before we can proceed on this transaction


thanks for your co-operation

best regards
david akamba
mobile-00233-24-863991

messages.body:
David my brother,

You said "I came to know you in the course of my search for foreign
investors".
If that's true, how could you not know I was the one and only 'T'?
I think it is you that should prove yourself. I pity the fool who offers Mr
T gold and then snatches it away!
That money could help out a lot of youth centers, and poor kids could have a
happier life too - you should understand that.
My brother, it was you that said we had to trust each other, well, I'm
trusting you - can you trust 'T'?

Be with me, my brother.

Yours in waiting,
Mista'tee Foo.
messages.raw:
MR T

My brother, it was you that said we had to trust each other, well, I'm trusting you - can you trust 'T'?

Be with me, my brother.

Yours in waiting,
Mista'tee Foo.

messages.body:
LISTEN UP, FOO'!

The T-Man does not take kindly to being called a liar!
You need to stop this jibba jabba and let's get this thing rolling!
Give me the number of your lawyer! I'll phone the foo' and he'll feel the
FORCE of T!

I've already sent you my passport, you can look at it and tell that it's
perfect, and yet YOU doubt ME, Mr T?
You've hurt me deep, brother.

Mista'tee.
messages.raw:
MR T

LISTEN UP, FOO'!

I've already sent you my passport, you can look at it and tell that it's perfect, and yet YOU doubt ME, Mr T? You've hurt me deep, brother.

Mista'tee.

messages.body:
David,
I tried to call your number but I couldn't get through.
I didn't have to long to try as I have an interview with "80's Hero's" magazine.
But what I did do, my secretary and I went into my garden and took a Polaroid of me, saying I want to help YOU! I'm all dressed up in my gold for this magazine, so I know that as one of my fans, you'll recognise Mr T!
My secretary scanned the picture and I'm attaching it to this message.
I hope this picture will prove who I am and make you realise that Mr T wants to help you!
Have you any idea how lucky you are to have got into contact with me? You know, in 1972 me and my crack commando unit were sent to prison by a military court for a crime we didn't even commit! We promptly escaped from a maximum security stockade to the Los Angeles underground, and survived as soldiers of fortune.
Now YOU have a problem, NO-ONE ELSE can help. You found me, and I'm ready to give you all the help you need!
We are A Team!

I hope to hear from you soon, my brother.

Mista'tee.

messages.body:
David my brother,
Pleased to see that you finally accept who I am!
I had my secretary call your lawyer several times this weekend, but the line was busy or something, because all she got was a strange noise, and then she got disconnected. She's going to get British Telecom to check the number.

I intend to spend the money on youth centers for kids. Them centers can bring a lot of joy to sad little lives. I don't need it myself, I've got plenty of money.

I can't give you my mobile telephone number for legal reasons, but my telephone number is 020 757 5655 - my secretary will answer. You need a code name to contact me - ask for 'Master Bates'. Be sure to call between 9am and 5pm GMT!

Yours,

Mista'tee

MR T

I can't give you my mobile telephone number for legal reasons, but my telephone number is 020 757 5655 - my secretary will answer. You need a code name to contact me - ask for 'Master Bates'. Be sure to call between 9am and 5pm GMT!

Yours,

Mista'tee

Dear mr.Tee,

But I am suprise that you could not get through to the lawyer,any way,you should have written the lawyer an email.

The lawyer actually will help in drawing some basic agreement between us,and also handle all legal issue regarding this transaction. But please I want you to know that the lawyer is not aware that there is money in the box,he thought it is family valuables, because that was what my late father told the security company as well as the lawyer.

So please you can contact the lawyer by email,so that we can proceed on this transaction.

best regards,
david akamba.

PLS I UNDERSTAND YOUR REASON OF REJECTING THE BARRISTER YOU THINK IS TO LOCAL , PLS MR T KNOW WE HAVE TO LOOK FOR ANOTHER LAWYER , WHO WE DO THE LEGAL DUTIES , THE POWER ATTORNEY AND CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP ,

THIS ARE THE DOCUMENT WE NEED TO GET FROM THE HIGH COURT GHANA IN YOUR NAME AND FULL ADDRESS , TO BE SIGNED BY ME GIVING YOUR THE POWER AND RIGHT AS THE NEW BENEFICIARY OF THE CONSIGNMENT, AFTER PREPARING THIS DOCUMENT, WE SHALL SEND THEM FOR THE PROCEEDURE OF CLAIMING THE CONSIGNMENT FROM THE SECURITY INSURANCE COMPANY . THIS ALL WE NEED TO DO . MYDEAR BROTHER AND FATHER MR T

DO BE FAST SO WE CAN LEAVE AFRICA BY THE END OF THE MOUNTH ,


MAY GOD BLESS YOU PLS AS YOU ASSIST .
TRY AND CALL ME IT WILL BE EASY IN THE NIGHT GHANA AND LONDON HAS ALMOST THESAME TIME DIFFERANCE ,

THAT WE GIVE YOUR THE DIRECT RIGHT TO DEAL WITH THE COMPANY DIRECT AND CLEAR THE CONSIGNMENT FOR TRANFER ,THIER AFTER WE WILL ARRANGE WITH GHANA CUSTOM DEPLOMATIC MEN TO DELIVER THE C0NSIGNMENT TO YOU IN EUROPE .



THIS ALL WE NEED TO DO . MYDEAR BROTHER AND FATHER MR T

PLS SHOULD I LOOK FOR ANOTHER LAWYER? THEN YOUR WILL SEND US THREE HUNDRED EURO ?, TO HIRE THE LAWYER AS YOU DISLIKE THIS ONE AND SACK HIM.THROUGH WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER ,PLS SEND IT TO MRS VIDA AGYEMEN SHE IS OUR REFUGEE CAMP CONDINATOR SHE IS THE ONE RECIEVING MONEY US IN THE CAMP.PLS AFTER SENDING THE MONEY CALL ME SO I CALLED ARRANGE FOR A NEW LAWYER TODAY OR TOMORROW ,AND SEND THE TEXT QUESTION AND CONTROL NUMBER TO MY MAIL BOX AND THE NAME YOU USE IN SENDING THE MONEY.

DO BE FAST SO WE CAN LEAVE AFRICA BY THE END OF THE MOUNTH ,

MAY GOD BLESS YOU PLS AS YOU ASSIST .

TRY AND CALL ME IT WILL BE EASY IN THE NIGHT GHANA AND LONDON HAS ALMOST THESAME TIME DIFFERANCE ,

BEST REGARDS

messages.body:
David!

I'm glad you got rid of 'Strass' - he was a joke, not a lawyer - he was trying to scam you!
No barrister costs $200, more like $2,000. He was a fraudster, trying to steal your money and take you for a ride.
Stick with Mr T, and I'll protect you from scammers like him!

Listen, foo', 300 Euro's ain't enough for a proper lawyer, and I guess you don't know who you can trust, but it's okay! I'll set you up with my lawyer, one of the best in this country, that ain't no problem.

Please fax the forms you need to my lawyer in the USA, his number is 775-806-7066. He can easily sort out all the legal mumbo-jumbo, and then fax the forms back to you, with my details filled out by me, so you can get your cash out of that country.
You see, my brother? Mr T is helping you out, just like he said he would!

I am devastated to hear that you had to sell your mothers gold necklace. I have hella amounts of gold, I wear it all the time. I'd like to send you $200 so you can buy your mothers necklace back - it's not your fault that your gave the money to that scamming lawyer! I've got a good mind to come out there and teach that 'lawyer' how to fly! These con artists may be tough, but they're not as tough as ME, MR T!

Tell me the details of Western Union Money Transfer, and I'll get one of my people onto it straight away.

If you want to talk, talk to my secretary - Elizabeth. You can ask for her on this number: 0207 839 1377.
Call that number, and ask for Elizabeth, and then tell her your new code name - 'Master Bating'.
If you speak to someone who won't put you through, say "Get me Elizabeth NOW! I'm Master Bating, damnit!".
Make sure you tell them that you are Master Bating and you need to talk to Elizabeth URGENTLY.

Your brother,
Mr T.

messages.body:
David my brother.
I've tried that number, but I can't get a good line - I guess the phones in your country are pretty unreliable.

The telephone number that you can ask for Elizabeth on is 0207 839 1377 and it's in England, so the number is +44 207 839 1377. Remember, say 'I am Master Bating, and I need to speak to Elizabeth right now!'.

I have had the $500 dollars sent to the person you asked. The 10-digit code is 7638793941. The security question is 'Who is the toughest in the world?' and the answer is, of course, 'Mr. T!'. The sender name is Chandler Bing.
I hope you can get your mothers necklace back, and that you don't get not scamming foo' lawyer this time!

The address you can put on that form is:

1337 High Street,
London.
W1 4DJ
England

My full legal name is 'Mister T'.

Good luck David!

messages.body:
David,
Of course I am not Mr T.
OF COURSE I AM NOT MR T!
How stupid are you?
We both know that there is no money, and there never was.
We both know, 'David', that you were trying to scam me out of $500, and that was probably just the beginning.
Please, give it up, go out, and get a real job, earn some honest money.
Maybe you'd like to visit the website http://www.scamorama.com - I'm going to send these emails to them so that they can post them on their website, so other people can believe how stupid you are.
How can you be dumb enough to believe that I was Mr T?
I've been posting these messages onto an online forum, and we've all been laughing at your stupidity.
Give it up, man. You're not clever enough to pull these scams off.
I'd imagine that your mother really would be crying if she knew what you did.
I'm blocking your email address now, so this will be the last we will hear from each other.
Just one more time to clarify, you, 'David Akamba' (although we both know that that isn't your real name) are an idiot.

See you, and cheers for all the laughs,
(not Mr T)
